channel.title: The Ghost Inside on
channel.description: Recent content in The Ghost Inside on

item.title: Avalanche
item.description: [[songs/p/pantera/the_great_southern_trendkill/suicide_note_pt_i.md#would-you-look-at-me-now-would-you-look-at-me-now-vyl-wnanory|I can’t stop screaming these words over again.]] [[songs/p/pantera/the_great_southern_trendkill/suicide_note_pt_i.md#would-you-look-at-me-now-would-you-look-at-me-now-vyl-wnanory|Until breath escapes and my chest caves in.]] [[songs/p/pantera/the_great_southern_trendkill/suicide_note_pt_i.md#would-you-look-at-me-now-would-you-look-at-me-now-vyl-wnanory|It doesn’t matter where I’ve been.

item.title: Avalanche
item.description: I can’t stop screaming these words over again. Until breath escapes and my chest caves in. It doesn’t matter where I’ve been.

item.title: Blank Pages
item.description: [[songs/n/new_model_army/impurity/whirlwind.md#i-felt-a-shiver-in-the-heathaze-and-the-waiting-time-is-over-vyl-wnanory|We’re from a long line of people running from themselves.]] [[songs/n/new_model_army/impurity/whirlwind.md#i-felt-a-shiver-in-the-heathaze-and-the-waiting-time-is-over-vyl-wnanory|Let’s look alive. The sun is blocked out from sight.

item.title: Dark Horse
item.description: [[songs/s/system_of_a_down/steal_this_album/innervision.md#vision-vyl-wnanory|True dedication most just do not posses]] [[songs/s/system_of_a_down/steal_this_album/innervision.md#vision-vyl-wnanory|When push becomes shove, can you rise above the rest?]] [[songs/s/system_of_a_down/steal_this_album/innervision.md#vision-vyl-wnanory|Waves of words, they fall short and crash at my feet]] [[songs/s/system_of_a_down/steal_this_album/innervision.

item.title: Dear Youth (Day 52)
item.description: The second hand looks like a knife. As it’s counting down the rest of our lives. So hard to swallow.

item.title: Dear Youth (Day 52)
item.description: [[songs/k/killswitch_engage/killswitch_engage/in_the_unblind.md#so-much-love-so-much-love-lost-vyl-wnanory|The second hand looks like a knife. As it’s counting down the rest of our lives.]] [[songs/k/killswitch_engage/killswitch_engage/in_the_unblind.md#so-much-love-so-much-love-lost-vyl-wnanory|So hard to swallow.

item.title: Deceiver
item.description: [[songs/f/front_line_assembly/virgin_voices__a_tribute_to_madonna_volume_one/justify_my_love.md#justify-vyl-wnanory|You are the deceiver.]] [[songs/f/front_line_assembly/virgin_voices__a_tribute_to_madonna_volume_one/justify_my_love.md#justify-vyl-wnanory|No excuse for the years you’ve spent cold.]] [[songs/f/front_line_assembly/virgin_voices__a_tribute_to_madonna_volume_one/justify_my_love.md#justify-vyl-wnanory|Spreading words like fire to build an arm,]] [[songs/f/front_line_assembly/virgin_voices__a_tribute_to_madonna_volume_one/justify_my_love.

item.title: Engine 45
item.description: [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/a_beautiful_lie/attack.md#your-promises-vyl-wnanory|Grab ahold of me, I’ve got my arms up.]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/a_beautiful_lie/attack.md#your-promises-vyl-wnanory|Pull me out from this darkness.]] [[songs/t/thirty_seconds_to_mars/a_beautiful_lie/attack.md#your-promises-vyl-wnanory|It’s so hard for me to see so light up the end of that tunnel.

item.title: Face Value
item.description: [[songs/p/pantera/projects_in_the_jungle/all_over_tonight.md#i-said-vyl-wnanory|This will not be the new revival or a claim to fame.]] [[songs/p/pantera/projects_in_the_jungle/all_over_tonight.md#i-said-vyl-wnanory|Far away from the slings and arrows is where you go to pass your blame.

item.title: Mercy
item.description: [[songs/m/metallica/ride_the_lightning/for_whom_the_bell_tolls.md#for-whom-the-bell-tolls-vyl-wnanory|For whom the bell tolls.]] [[songs/o/opeth/morningrise/nectar.md#leave-me-speechless-vyl-wnanory|There’s a hurricane raging inside me. The second wave is right there behind me.

item.title: Move Me
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#we-threw-swords-in-the-oceans-wide-and-deep-vyl-wnanory|I leave behind this sentiment to the man that I’ll become.]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#we-threw-swords-in-the-oceans-wide-and-deep-vyl-wnanory|Telling him not to be burdened by the things that I have done.

item.title: My Endnote
item.description: [[songs/i/in_flames/come_clarity/reflect_the_storm.md#away-from-the-light-of-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|Consider this my endnote to be read when I’m gone.]] [[songs/i/in_flames/come_clarity/reflect_the_storm.md#away-from-the-light-of-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|I have always been looking for this, dying for this, but It seems I’ve lost track.

item.title: Out Of Control
item.description: [[songs/o/opeth/ghost_reveries/ghost_of_perdition.md#devil-cracked-the-earthly-shell-vyl-wnanory|It appears that we can’t rely on common sense.]] [[songs/o/opeth/ghost_reveries/ghost_of_perdition.md#devil-cracked-the-earthly-shell-vyl-wnanory|Let’s act our age and turn the page on this intolerance.

item.title: Outlive
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/electric.md#underneath-vyl-wnanory|We’re so disconnected but not misdirected.]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/electric.md#underneath-vyl-wnanory|They think that we are nothing, but I believe in something more.]] [[songs/g/girls_under_glass/zyklus/love_is_in_my_world.

item.title: Phoenix Flame
item.description: [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/new_storms_for_older_lovers.md#breathe-in-breathe-in-vyl-wnanory|Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe.]] [[songs/d/darkest_hour/darkest_hour/the_misery_we_make.md#and-ill-never-be-what-you-vyl-wnanory|I’ll never be what you think I should be. No, not today.]] [[songs/d/darkest_hour/darkest_hour/the_misery_we_make.md#and-ill-never-be-what-you-vyl-wnanory|I’ll never say all the things I should say.

item.title: Slipping Away
item.description: [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/the_pretender.md#what-if-i-say-im-not-like-the-others-vyl-wnanory|We look up to the sky, I swear it never ends.]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/the_pretender.md#what-if-i-say-im-not-like-the-others-vyl-wnanory|Walk down the road on any path we choose.

item.title: Test The Limits
item.description: [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/archers.md#help-vyl-wnanory|I could tell you what you want to hear to hold you off another year.]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/archers.md#help-vyl-wnanory|But I hope the truth finds you well.

item.title: The Great Unknown
item.description: [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/alpha_omega.md#sun-of-god-sun-in-the-sky-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes we get so low]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/alpha_omega.md#sun-of-god-sun-in-the-sky-vyl-wnanory|Downsides are all we see]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/alpha_omega.md#sun-of-god-sun-in-the-sky-vyl-wnanory|Your world is swallowed whole]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/alpha_omega.md#sun-of-god-sun-in-the-sky-vyl-wnanory|And now you’re all alone waiting for me]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/alpha_omega.

item.title: The Other Half
item.description: [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|We believe in a system that has long been broken.]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|We turn the other cheek without a glimpse of emotion.

item.title: Thirty Three
item.description: [[songs/b/billy_talent/billy_talent_ii/this_suffering.md#and-when-she-spins-the-bottle-round-and-round-vyl-wnanory|I was lead to believe, but now I know for sure.]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/billy_talent_ii/this_suffering.md#and-when-she-spins-the-bottle-round-and-round-vyl-wnanory|When the wind’s knocked out of me.]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/billy_talent_ii/this_suffering.md#and-when-she-spins-the-bottle-round-and-round-vyl-wnanory|Only one thing that can be cure and bring me to my feet.

item.title: This Is What I Know About Sacrifice
item.description: [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/seen_to_run.md#the-trick-is-to-keep-lying-vyl-wnanory|This is what I know about sacrifice:]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/seen_to_run.md#the-trick-is-to-keep-lying-vyl-wnanory|Meet me at the crossroads - let’s go! Oh!]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/seen_to_run.md#the-trick-is-to-keep-lying-vyl-wnanory|This life is constant sacrifice.

item.title: White Light
item.description: [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/facelift/man_in_the_box.md#feed-my-eyes-can-you-sew-them-shut-vyl-wnanory|You left some hope instilled in me]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/facelift/man_in_the_box.md#feed-my-eyes-can-you-sew-them-shut-vyl-wnanory|That I never should give up on anything]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/facelift/man_in_the_box.md#feed-my-eyes-can-you-sew-them-shut-vyl-wnanory|I know this made you proud of me]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/facelift/man_in_the_box.

item.title: Wide Eyed
item.description: [[songs/h/heaven_shall_burn/invictus/the_omen.md#closing-your-eyes-is-nothing-but-surrender-vyl-wnanory|This is not a dream cause I am not asleep.]] [[songs/h/heaven_shall_burn/invictus/the_omen.md#closing-your-eyes-is-nothing-but-surrender-vyl-wnanory|I’ll need more than a metaphor if I want to earn my keep.

item.title: With The Wolves
item.description: [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.md#if-all-i-ever-wanted-wasnt-good-for-you-vyl-wnanory|Somewhere along the way we got thrown off track.]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.md#if-all-i-ever-wanted-wasnt-good-for-you-vyl-wnanory|Though we tried so hard to keep ourselves in check.]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/ebbhead/ascend.
